class Ability[source]

Ability(damage, damage_type)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Character[source]

Character(name, max_health, ability)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Mage[source]

Mage(name, max_health, ability) :: Character

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mage = Mage("Puneet", 100, Ability(10, "water"))
print(mage)

            Puneet's character health: 100
            Puneet's max health: 100
            Puneet's Ability damage: 10
            Puneet's Ability type:  water
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mage.attack(mage)

From Puneet, ice cold water is flung towards Puneet
